page.title: Peacemakers
page.description: The page for The Meeting House 2021 Peacemakers campaign in partnership with MCC Canada.

content.text1: This year, through our annual Peacemakers campaign, we want to not only raise the money necessary to support life-changing peacebuilding projects, but we also want to inspire you to take action.

button1.description: Introduction to our Peacemakers campaign by clicking button to watch video.

content.text1: What does justice look like and how can we take meaningful action to work towards peace in our communities and around the world? Check out the resources below for activities you can do with your family.

list.title: Oakville Family Movie Fundraiser
list.text: Let’s kick off Peacemakers with a family friendly event - watching the  movie Encanto together! Concession stand includes snacks, beverages & pepperoni or cheese PIZZA! Prices are $1 to $3. Debit or credit accepted.
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Jimmy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Oakville Refugee Encounter
list.text: In the history of humanity, there have never been as many refugees around the world as we are seeing today. Join us for our 3rd Annual Refugee Encounter to learn more about Tayiba and Elyas’ journey since fleeing their home in Ethiopia. Learn how your donation can support refugees on their journey to a new life. Debit or credit accepted.
